page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
In the Bulls Cross area there is a neighbourhood watch scheme, in which neighbours keep a close watch on their area. People participating in the scheme have a badge in their windows. They keep a look out for things like robberies, people acting suspiciously e.g. prowlers, and other nuisances like glue sniffers - a great problem nowadays in our area.
Although there is no police station in Bulls Cross, the nearest one being in Enfield Town, the local policeman who patrols this area is in constant touch with his police station by means of personal radio or the car radios.
